virtual_online_exhibition_text: Create an advanced, interactive, fun virtual trade show with us! Find loads of different exciting features that can help you engage the attendees and exhibitors!
invite_stand_owners_title: Invite stand owners to participate in your event!
invite_stand_owners_text: Let's start with the basics. Stands or so called booths are personal spaces that are created for exhibitors
invite_stand_owners_tab1: You can find all presenters in the “Our Staff Tab”
invite_stand_owners_tab2: Find information about the staff of the booth at the event or stand
invite_stand_owners_tab3: From the stand you can either schedule a meeting or start chat with their staff member
customise_the_stand_text: The stand owners would love to match their brand identity to the stand. Everyone wants to stand out from the crowd.
chat_with_stand_staff_title: Chat with the stand's staff / Create a meeting
chat_with_stand_staff_text: Our platform allows not only view the information about the exhibitor, but also interact with their staff.
chat_with_stand_staff_tab1: Use either zoom or our in-house broadcast tool!
chat_with_stand_staff_tab3: Choose the staff member of the stand that matches your need.
one_one_one_chat_title: 1 on 1 meeting with event/stand owners
one_one_one_chat_text: One to one meeting is essential in our virtual world. Having this personal touch in an online communication is a key to success!
one_one_one_chat_tab1: Have One on Ones through the calendar
